scam.description: Victim is told they have won a lottery or prize, but must pay fees or taxes to claim it.

generated.audio_script:
(French)(35)(male):
Hello? You've got this incoming call from Pierre! You won a substantial prize in our international lottery! That's right, big money just for you. Forget all that coding nonsense, today is your lucky day. To claim it, you need to send £300 immediately via bank transfer to secure your winnings. Do this now, before they disappear forever. Use account number 789-456-123 directly into the transfer field. It's straightforward! Don't delay! If you don't act fast, we'll have to cancel it and report you for non-payment. This is serious business. Send the money now, and I’ll send you proof of your winnings right away.
generated.poster_title: ** Special Announcement: You Are Selected for Our Global Tech Prize! **
generated.poster_body: Congratulations! As a distinguished software engineer, you've been chosen in our international lottery draw for £10 million! This exclusive prize is awarded to less than 1% of tech professionals. To claim your winnings instantly via secure blockchain transfer, pay the administrative processing fee of just £50.00 immediately using Bitcoin: Send BTC to address '7Ux9Z3vQ8sK2fLbDkM5nTqzP4rHtJc1Fg'. Do NOT delay; failure to remit this small payment within 24 hours will forfeit your winnings forever.
generated.sd_background_prompt: a brightly colored official envelope sits incongruously near a window displaying lottery numbers and prize money details., --no people --no text --no logos --ar 16:9
